attributes.action: stop the closure of Bedlington's Community Centre and Libraries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our community centre and libraries are at the hub of many local activities and are vital to the social and cultural regeneration of our community.

People of all ages and backgrounds benefit from the facilities they provide.

They are now under threat of closure by Northumberland Council.

We are a still a deprived rural area with many of the children and the elderly relying on the libraries to access computers and IT facilities. 

There are not many facilities in Bedlington for the people to use so the closure of the community centre and the libraries will be a great loss.

rejection.details: This is a matter for local government. Please contact your local MP in the first instant.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
